message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think you'll find it's worth every penny of my asking price of $200.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $200 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $120 at this time.
Bob, I understand your position, but $120 is too low for me.  Could you meet me halfway at $160?
Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $160 is still a little high for me. I'm willing to go up to $135.  Let's see if we can find a middle ground.
